newsitem.title: USA: U.S. cotton weekly export sales highlights -- USDA.
newsitem.headline: U.S. cotton weekly export sales highlights -- USDA.

text.p: USDA cotton export sales highlights in latest reporting week:
Net Upland sales of 257,200 running bales (RB)--a marketing-year high--exceeded the previous week by one-fifth and the 4-week average by 64 percent.

The major increases were for China (58,000 RB), Mexico (35,500 RB), Turkey (35,200 RB), South Korea (34,300 RB), and Brazil (21,400 RB). Exports of 127,600 RB were off one-quarter from the previous week and 19 percent from the 4-week average. Asian destinations accounted for 64 percent of the week's shipments; Western Hemisphere, 32 percent; and West European, 4 percent.
